          <title>
            <string language="fr">La Terre</string>
            <string language="en">The Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre la terre, trois de ses chaînes de montagne et ses pôles nord et sud.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the Earth, three of its mountain ranges and its North and South Poles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Les Andes</string>
            <string language="en">Andes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">chaîne de montagne</string>
            <string language="en">mountain ranges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pôle Nord</string>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">montagnes rocheuses</string>
            <string language="en">Rocky mountains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pôle Sud</string>
            <string language="en">south pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">montagnes de l'Oural</string>
            <string language="en">Ural mountains</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Masse, drei seiner 
Gebirgsstrecken und seine Nord- und Südpole.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a terra, três de suas 
escalas da montanha e seus pólos nortes e sul.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la terra, tre delle 
relative gamme della montagna ed i relativi pali del nord e del sud.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη γη, τρεις από τις 
σειρές βουνών της και το Βορρά και νότιους Πολωνούς της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a la tierra, a tres de 
sus rangos de la montaña y a sus postes del norte y del sur.</string>
          </description>
